eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.csv

Class IndexBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.csv.IndexBuilder

  • public class IndexBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builds the specified indices over the values of an attribute from a dataset according to user's configuration. Supported indices: Inverted Index (for categorical search); B+-tree (for numerical search); R-tree (for spatial search).

    • Method Detail

      • proc

        public void proc(MountSpecs mountConfig,
                 DatasetIdentifier id,
                 JdbcConnector jdbcConn)
        Builds an index for the identified dataset according to user-specified configurations.
        Parameters:
        mountConfig - Configuration for reading the attribute values and constructing an index prior to query execution.
        id - Identifier of the dataset on which an index will be built.
        jdbcConn - Specifications for the JDBC connection to be used for retrieving attribute values and constructing an in-memory index.
